participant_1.background:
I got a new dog last Christmas and we love going running together.
music has always been my number one passion.
i enjoy watching football and hockey games.
I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.
I have a cat who was a stray that we adopted.

participant_2.background:
I used to drink chocolate milk shakes with my friends on hot summer days.
I like to cook Thai food and eat it too.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.
i am fluent in spanish.
i have only one child.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
Good! I just finished a Thai cooking class and I'm feeling inspired to cook some more.
Oh nice! I love Thai food. My family used to live in Thailand and I have a lot of fond memories of eating Thai food there.
That's so cool! I've never been to Thailand, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing country with a rich culture.
I will definitely put it on my list!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, spend time with my family, and go for walks in the park.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time. I like to do a lot of the same things, but I also like to play sports and watch football and hockey games.
I used to play sports when I was younger, but I don't have as much time for them anymore. I still enjoy watching sports though.
Me too! I love watching football and hockey. I'm also a big fan of the New England Patriots and the Boston Bruins.
I'm a fan of the New York Giants and the New York Rangers.
Nice! We should have a sports watching party sometime!
